subject: Baseball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Yankees’ Phil Hughes, a first-rounder in 2004, and Joba Chamberlain, a 2006 first-rounder, are useful pitchers who could be elsewhere next season.
snippet: The Yankees’ Phil Hughes, a first-rounder in 2004, and Joba Chamberlain, a 2006 first-rounder, are useful pitchers who could be elsewhere next season.
